entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Clearing near noon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 13 except minus 7 along parts of the coast.
